articles.description: Follow radio commentary & live text updates as Bournemouth host Spurs, before five other Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up & team news as Bournemouth host Spurs

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary of Ross County v Rangers, then Celtic v St Johnstone, and updates of the rest of the day's Scottish football action.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Ross County host Rangers in early kick-off

articles.description: Follow live coverage from day eight of the World Athletics Championships in Budapest.
articles.title: Watch: World Athletics Championships - eight gold medals to be won on day eight

articles.description: The Spanish football federation says it will take legal action over Jenni Hermoso's comments about its president Luis Rubiales.
articles.title: Spanish FA to take legal action over Hermoso 'lies'

articles.description: Cincinnati Reds fielder Spencer Steer takes a catch to deny Arizona's Tommy Phan a home run - only to have the ball snatched from his glove by a child in the crowd.
articles.title: Kid in crowd steals baseball from catcher's glove

articles.description: In his BBC Sport column, Michael Johnson discusses Noah Lyles' ability to thrive under pressure after his World Championships sprint double.
articles.title: 'Lyles thrives under pressure of bold statements'

articles.description: Before Daniel Dubois tries to overcome unified heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk on Saturday, BBC Sport rounds up predictions from the boxing world.
articles.title: 'A puncher's chance' - Usyk v Dubois predictions

articles.description: Pace bowler Josh Tongue is ruled out of England's T20 series against New Zealand through injury, with Chris Jordan replacing him.
articles.title: Injured Tongue replaced by Jordan for NZ T20 series

articles.description: President Luis Rubiales has refused to resign and 81 female players say they won't play until he steps down.
articles.title: Spain FA accuses Jenni Hermoso of lying about Rubiales World Cup kiss - BBC News

articles.description: As part of our England Next Gen series we look at Northern Superchargers wicketkeeper Bess Heath.
articles.title: 'Destructive' Heath ready to put pressure on Jones
